Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
i would like to know, when my campaign will be approved?

The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be even earlier, thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team! If it's been longer than that, please let me know so I can assist you further.

I understand that your campaign approval is taking longer than expected. To help expedite the process, please provide the following details:

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once you have this information ready, please email it to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. This will help us conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
